AcceptMatch.name: AcceptMatch
AcceptMatch.description: Registers player acceptance or rejection of a proposed FlexMatch match.

ClaimGameServer.name: ClaimGameServer
ClaimGameServer.description: Locates and reserves a game server to host a new game session.

CreateAlias.name: CreateAlias
CreateAlias.description: Defines a new alias for a fleet.

CreateBuild.name: CreateBuild
CreateBuild.description: Creates a new game build using files stored in an Amazon S3 bucket.

CreateFleet.name: CreateFleet
CreateFleet.description: Creates a new fleet of computing resources to run your game servers.

CreateGameServerGroup.name: CreateGameServerGroup
CreateGameServerGroup.description:
Creates a new game server group, sets up a corresponding Auto Scaling group, and launches
                                                instances to host game servers.

CreateGameSession.name: CreateGameSession
CreateGameSession.description: Starts a new game session on a specified fleet.

CreateGameSessionQueue.name: CreateGameSessionQueue
CreateGameSessionQueue.description: Sets up a new queue for processing new game session placement requests.

CreateMatchmakingRuleSet.name: CreateMatchmakingRuleSet
CreateMatchmakingRuleSet.description: Creates a new matchmaking rule set for FlexMatch.

CreatePlayerSession.name: CreatePlayerSession
CreatePlayerSession.description: Reserves an available game session slot for a player.

CreatePlayerSessions.name: CreatePlayerSessions
CreatePlayerSessions.description: Reserves available game session slots for multiple players.

CreateScript.name: CreateScript
CreateScript.description: Creates a new Realtime Servers script.

CreateVpcPeeringAuthorization.name: CreateVpcPeeringAuthorization
CreateVpcPeeringAuthorization.description:
Allows GameLift to create or delete a peering connection between a GameLift fleet
                                                VPC and a VPC on another AWS account.

CreateVpcPeeringConnection.name: CreateVpcPeeringConnection
CreateVpcPeeringConnection.description:
Establishes a peering connection between your GameLift fleet VPC and a VPC on another
                                                account.

DeleteGameServerGroup.name: DeleteGameServerGroup
DeleteGameServerGroup.description:
Permanently deletes a game server group and terminates FleetIQ activity for the corresponding
                                                Auto Scaling group.

DeleteGameSessionQueue.name: DeleteGameSessionQueue
DeleteGameSessionQueue.description: Deletes an existing game session queue.

DeleteMatchmakingRuleSet.name: DeleteMatchmakingRuleSet
DeleteMatchmakingRuleSet.description: Deletes an existing FlexMatch matchmaking rule set.

DeleteScalingPolicy.name: DeleteScalingPolicy
DeleteScalingPolicy.description: Deletes a set of auto-scaling rules.

DeleteVpcPeeringConnection.name: DeleteVpcPeeringConnection
DeleteVpcPeeringConnection.description: Removes a peering connection between VPCs.

DeregisterGameServer.name: DeregisterGameServer
DeregisterGameServer.description: Removes a game server from a game server group.

DescribeBuild.name: DescribeBuild
DescribeBuild.description: Retrieves properties for a game build.

DescribeEC2InstanceLimits.name: DescribeEC2InstanceLimits
DescribeEC2InstanceLimits.description: Retrieves the maximum allowed and current usage for EC2 instance types.

DescribeFleetAttributes.name: DescribeFleetAttributes
DescribeFleetAttributes.description: Retrieves general properties, including status, for fleets.

DescribeFleetCapacity.name: DescribeFleetCapacity
DescribeFleetCapacity.description: Retrieves the current capacity setting for fleets.

DescribeFleetEvents.name: DescribeFleetEvents
DescribeFleetEvents.description: Retrieves entries from a fleet's event log.

DescribeFleetPortSettings.name: DescribeFleetPortSettings
DescribeFleetPortSettings.description: Retrieves the inbound connection permissions for a fleet.

DescribeGameServer.name: DescribeGameServer
DescribeGameServer.description: Retrieves properties for a game server.

DescribeGameServerGroup.name: DescribeGameServerGroup
DescribeGameServerGroup.description: Retrieves properties for a game server group.

DescribeGameServerInstances.name: DescribeGameServerInstances
DescribeGameServerInstances.description: Retrieves the status of EC2 instances in a game server group.

DescribeGameSessionDetails.name: DescribeGameSessionDetails
DescribeGameSessionDetails.description: Retrieves properties for game sessions in a fleet, including the protection policy.

DescribeGameSessionPlacement.name: DescribeGameSessionPlacement
DescribeGameSessionPlacement.description: Retrieves details of a game session placement request.

DescribeGameSessionQueues.name: DescribeGameSessionQueues
DescribeGameSessionQueues.description: Retrieves properties for game session queues.

DescribeGameSessions.name: DescribeGameSessions
DescribeGameSessions.description: Retrieves properties for game sessions in a fleet.

DescribeInstances.name: DescribeInstances
DescribeInstances.description: Retrieves information about instances in a fleet.

DescribeMatchmakingRuleSets.name: DescribeMatchmakingRuleSets
DescribeMatchmakingRuleSets.description: Retrieves properties for FlexMatch matchmaking rule sets.

DescribePlayerSessions.name: DescribePlayerSessions
DescribePlayerSessions.description: Retrieves properties for player sessions in a game session.

DescribeRuntimeConfiguration.name: DescribeRuntimeConfiguration
DescribeRuntimeConfiguration.description: Retrieves the current runtime configuration for a fleet.

DescribeScalingPolicies.name: DescribeScalingPolicies
DescribeScalingPolicies.description: Retrieves all scaling policies that are applied to a fleet.

DescribeScript.name: DescribeScript
DescribeScript.description: Retrieves properties for a Realtime Servers script.

DescribeVpcPeeringConnections.name: DescribeVpcPeeringConnections
DescribeVpcPeeringConnections.description: Retrieves details on active or pending VPC peering connections.

GetGameSessionLogUrl.name: GetGameSessionLogUrl
GetGameSessionLogUrl.description: Retrieves the location of stored logs for a game session.

GetInstanceAccess.name: GetInstanceAccess
GetInstanceAccess.description: Requests remote access to a specified fleet instance.

ListAliases.name: ListAliases
ListAliases.description: Retrieves all aliases that are defined in the current region.

ListBuilds.name: ListBuilds
ListBuilds.description: Retrieves all game build in the current region.

ListFleets.name: ListFleets
ListFleets.description: Retrieves a list of fleet IDs for all fleets in the current region.

ListGameServerGroups.name: ListGameServerGroups
ListGameServerGroups.description: Retrieves all game server groups that are defined in the current region.

ListGameServers.name: ListGameServers
ListGameServers.description: Retrieves all game servers that are currently running in a game server group.

ListScripts.name: ListScripts
ListScripts.description: Retrieves properties for all Realtime Servers scripts in the current region.

PutScalingPolicy.name: PutScalingPolicy
PutScalingPolicy.description: Creates or updates a fleet auto-scaling policy.

RegisterGameServer.name: RegisterGameServer
RegisterGameServer.description: Notifies GameLift FleetIQ when a new game server is ready to host gameplay.

RequestUploadCredentials.name: RequestUploadCredentials
RequestUploadCredentials.description: Retrieves fresh upload credentials to use when uploading a new game build.

ResolveAlias.name: ResolveAlias
ResolveAlias.description: Retrieves the fleet ID associated with an alias.

ResumeGameServerGroup.name: ResumeGameServerGroup
ResumeGameServerGroup.description: Reinstates suspended FleetIQ activity for a game server group.

SearchGameSessions.name: SearchGameSessions
SearchGameSessions.description: Retrieves game sessions that match a set of search criteria.

StartFleetActions.name: StartFleetActions
StartFleetActions.description: Resumes auto-scaling activity on a fleet after it was suspended with StopFleetActions().

StartGameSessionPlacement.name: StartGameSessionPlacement
StartGameSessionPlacement.description: Sends a game session placement request to a game session queue.

StartMatchBackfill.name: StartMatchBackfill
StartMatchBackfill.description:
Requests FlexMatch matchmaking to fill available player slots in an existing game
                                                session.

StartMatchmaking.name: StartMatchmaking
StartMatchmaking.description:
Requests FlexMatch matchmaking for one or a group of players and game session placement
                                                for a resulting match.

StopFleetActions.name: StopFleetActions
StopFleetActions.description: Suspends auto-scaling activity on a fleet.

StopGameSessionPlacement.name: StopGameSessionPlacement
StopGameSessionPlacement.description: Cancels a game session placement request that is in progress.

StopMatchmaking.name: StopMatchmaking
StopMatchmaking.description: Cancels a matchmaking or match backfill request that is in progress.

SuspendGameServerGroup.name: SuspendGameServerGroup
SuspendGameServerGroup.description: Temporarily stops FleetIQ activity for a game server group.

UpdateAlias.name: UpdateAlias
UpdateAlias.description: Updates the properties of an existing alias.

UpdateFleetAttributes.name: UpdateFleetAttributes
UpdateFleetAttributes.description: Updates the general properties of an existing fleet.

UpdateGameServer.name: UpdateGameServer
UpdateGameServer.description: Changes game server properties, health status, or utilization status.

UpdateGameServerGroup.name: UpdateGameServerGroup
UpdateGameServerGroup.description: Updates properties for game server group, including allowed instance types.

UpdateGameSession.name: UpdateGameSession
UpdateGameSession.description: Updates the properties of an existing game session.

UpdateGameSessionQueue.name: UpdateGameSessionQueue
UpdateGameSessionQueue.description: Updates properties of an existing game session queue.

UpdateMatchmakingConfiguration.name: UpdateMatchmakingConfiguration
UpdateMatchmakingConfiguration.description: Updates properties of an existing FlexMatch matchmaking configuration.

UpdateRuntimeConfiguration.name: UpdateRuntimeConfiguration
UpdateRuntimeConfiguration.description: Updates how server processes are configured on instances in an existing fleet.

UpdateScript.name: UpdateScript
UpdateScript.description: Updates the metadata and content of an existing Realtime Servers script.

ValidateMatchmakingRuleSet.name: ValidateMatchmakingRuleSet
ValidateMatchmakingRuleSet.description: Validates the syntax of a FlexMatch matchmaking rule set.
